import { Component, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; import {Hero} from '../../Models/hero' import {Observable, Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { Store, Action } from '@ngrx/store'; import * as heroActions from '../Store/heroes.actions' import * as fromHeroList from '../Store/heroes.reducer' @Component({ selector: 'app-display', templateUrl: './display.component.html', styleUrls: ['./display.component.css'] }) export class DisplayComponent implements OnDestroy { constructor(private store: Store) {console.log("display comp init")} heroes: Observable; //heroes: Hero[]; ngOnInit(): void { // this.store.select('heroList').subscribe( // { // next : (hero) => this.heroes = hero.Heroes, // error: (error) => console.log(error) // } // ) this.heroes = this.store.select('heroList') } ngOnDestroy(): void { console.log("destroyed display component") } }
